description: Moscow targeted civilian areas in a missile attack that left seven people buried under the rubble of an apartment building in the southern city of Mykolaiv, Ukraine.
title: Russian Missile Strike Hits Apartments in Southern Ukraine
title_page: Russian Missile Strike Hits Apartments in Southern Ukraine - The New York Times
